title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on initial attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it fails to register the selection on the first try.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item.

Observed Behavior: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: After clicking on an item, it should be selected in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.
OB: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: After clicking on an item, it should be selected in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.

2. Attempt to select an item.
